item.title: How do i make a simple quest who WORK?
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

The simplest way of doing this is making a token in your character file, Then updating the token to a new number (+1) every time you speak to the required person. Then have the new person relay dialouge using dialogue hander and action handler depending on the characters quest point.

This is the most simple way. I’m not going to spoon feed you.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a simple quest who WORK?

item.title: How do i make a simple quest who WORK?
item.dc:creator: @liamp liamp
item.description:
@liamp wrote:

neroxx:

anyone know how i can make a simple quest? other tutorials dont work :S ill rep++ if you help me

im thinking you mean simple quest like this: on the quest tab you make your name off the quest then when you click it could teleport you to were a npc would be and then you make the npc dialog you make the dialog in DialogueHandler and the npc could say you can start this quest by bringing me 10 logs 1 tinder box and so on

if this is not what you wont post more info we not gunna spoon feed you a quest you need to try and start and when you cant do something or get errors then you post
